articles.content: Godrej Properties on Friday said it has achieved sales bookings worth Rs 1,210 crore in its two new housing projects in Mumbai. Godrej Properties, a part of business conglomerate Godrej Group, is one… [+1722 chars]

articles.title: Gold prices in India today tumble to lowest in 6 months | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Gold rates today struggled near two-year lows amid elevated US dollar and prospects of aggressive US rate hikes
articles.content: Gold prices in India remained near 6-month lows as MCX futures fell sharply to 48,951 per 10 gram at day's lows. Silver futures dipped 0.4% to 56,194 per kg. On Thursday, gold had tumbled 1.4% while … [+2474 chars]

articles.title: Mauritius-based FII buys stake in multibagger small-cap stock. Share hits upper circuit | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Mauritius-based FII bought 50,000 shares of the small-cap company paying  ₹101 apiece
articles.content: Multibagger stock: Mauritius-based foreign investment agency Eriska Investment Fund has bought stake in a small-cap Indian company Sampre Nutritions Ltd. The FII has bought 50,000 shares of this BSE-… [+2484 chars]
